title: "Prince of Wales Investiture Bank" still bank

description: dull green hexagon with coin slot on top; on one side in gold: \"The Prince of Wales Caernarvon 1969\"; on the opposite side the same in Welsh; on two sides, the three feather insignia of the Prince of Wales; on two sides the Welsh dragon insignia; metal stopper on bottom;
